translations: 自由保有；[会计] 不动产所有权

sentences.sentence: The property register will also say whether the property is freehold or leasehold.
sentences.translation: 财产登记薄也会写出该财产是永久业权的还是租凭的。

sentences.sentence: People owning leasehold homes will be given a new right to buy the freehold of their property.
sentences.translation: 拥有租凭房屋的人们将被给予一项新的权利买下他们房产的永久业权。

sentences.sentence: The freehold, says Lady Ford, will create more certainty in dealing with developers.
sentences.translation: Ford夫人认为，这些不动产将会在和开发商谈判时创造更大利益。
